column5: http://thechronicleherald.ca/Front/9012652.html  Hopefully she wont become a fish farm or be turned into razor blades she is the last of her kind and should be treated with reverence and respect I know they will do the right thing I MISS YOU BABY you sexy sleek grey hound of death
I saw her, a few years back, tied off in Bridgewater.  She was a sorry sight, and it was sad to see a greyhound abandoned in such a state. I hope they do right by her now.
